title: Live Updates: Shinzo Abe Taken to Hospital After Apparently Being Shot
content:
1. Live Updates: Shinzo Abe Taken to Hospital After Apparently Being Shot  The New York Times
  2. Former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe in a state of cardiopulmonary arrest after possible shooting, fire department says  CNN
  3. Former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe reportedly shot during campaign speech  CBS Los Angeles
  4. Former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe rushed to hospital after shooting; suspect arrested  Fox News
  5. Yen, Treasuries Gain in Haven Bid After News of Japan Shooting  Bloomberg
contentSnippet:

localize.title: ライブアップデート 安倍晋三が撃たれて病院に運ばれた模様
现场更新。安倍晋三显然被枪击后被送往医院
現場更新。安倍晉三顯然被槍擊後被送往醫院
